content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) 
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
No information about this structure is available in the logs.

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5, y=-30.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that the burner entities have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that the entities have the required ingredients before using them.
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that the steam engines are connected to the boiler and offshore pump before using them.
### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that the electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before using them.
### Errors when using pipe groups without fuel
- Ensure that the pipe groups have fuel before using them.
### Errors when using transport belts without items
- Ensure that the transport belts have items to transport before using them.

# NAMESPACE
No information about the namespace is available in the logs.
